Symptom Text: Your tomato plant has Yellow Leaf Curl Virus. Use resistant varieties.
Igba tomato rẹ̀ ní àrùn Yellow Leaf Curl Virus. Lo irú ewé tí kò ní àrùn.
Shukar tumatir dinka na da cutar Yellow Leaf Curl Virus. Yi amfani da iri masu juriya.
Ụgbọ tomato gị nwere ọrịa Yellow Leaf Curl Virus. Jiri ụdị tomato nwere mgbochi.
Na Yellow Leaf Curl Virus dey worry your tomato. Use beta seed wey no dey catch am.
Your maize plant has Maize Streak Virus. Control it using resistant maize varieties.
Agbado rẹ ní àrùn Maize Streak Virus. Lo irú agbado tí kò ní àrùn.
Shukar masara dinka na da Maize Streak Virus. Yi amfani da iri masu juriya.
Ụgbọ ọka gị nwere Maize Streak Virus. Jiri ụdị ọka nwere mgbochi.
Na Maize Streak Virus dey disturb your corn. Use strong corn seed wey no dey catch am.
Your cassava has Cassava Mosaic Disease. Use clean cuttings and resistant varieties.
Ẹ̀gúsí rẹ̀ ní àrùn Cassava Mosaic. Lo ewé mímọ́ àti irú tí kò ní àrùn.
Maniyok dinka na da Cassava Mosaic. Yi amfani da tsiron lafiya da iri masu juriya.
Cassava gị nwere Cassava Mosaic. Jiri akọrọ dị ọcha na ụdị nwere mgbochi.
Your cassava get Cassava Mosaic. Use clean stem and cassava wey strong.
Your rice plant shows symptoms of Rice Blast. Apply fungicide and avoid dense planting.
Igbà irìsì rẹ̀ ní àwòra Rice Blast. Lo ewé àkórè àti yà àgbàdo kúrò nítòsí.
Shukar shinkafa na nuna alamomin Rice Blast. Yi amfani da maganin fungi kuma kada ka cika shuka.
Ọka nri gị nwere Rice Blast. Tinye ọgwụ fungus ma werepụ̀rị̀ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ osisi.
Na Rice Blast dey affect your rice. Spray antifungus and no plant dem too close.
Your potato plant has Late Blight. Use fungicides and resistant varieties.
Igba poteto rẹ̀ ní Late Blight. Lo ewé àkórè àti ewé tó lagbara.
Shukar dankalin turawa na da Late Blight. Yi amfani da maganin fungi.
Poteto gị nwere Late Blight. Jiri ọgwụ na-akwalite nguzogide.
Na Late Blight dey worry your potato. Spray antifungus.
Your beans show signs of Anthracnose. Avoid overhead watering and apply fungicide.
Ewé ewa rẹ̀ ní àwò Anthracnose. Má fi omi ṣàn lórí ewé, lo àkórè.
Wake dinka na da Anthracnose. Kada ka yayyafa ruwa kai tsaye, yi amfani da magani.
Akwụkwọ agwa gị nwere Anthracnose. Zere iji mmiri kpọrọ ya, tinye ọgwụ.
Your beans get Anthracnose. No pour water from top. Spray antifungus.
Your groundnut is affected by Rosette Virus. Control aphids and plant early.
Epa rẹ̀ ní àrùn Rosette. Pa kokoro run, gbìn ni kutukutu.
Gyada dinka na da Rosette. Sarrafa kwari kuma shuka da wuri.
Ọka epa gị nwere Rosette. Kpochapụ kokoro, gbọmgharị tupu oge eruo.
Your groundnut get Rosette Virus. Kill small-small insects and plant early.
Your cocoa tree has Black Pod Disease. Remove infected pods and apply fungicide.
Igba koko rẹ̀ ní Black Pod. Yọ eso tó ní àrùn, lo àkórè.
Cokalet dinka na da Black Pod. Cire korayen da cuta ya kama.
Koko gị nwere Black Pod. Wepụ mkpụrụ mebiri emebi, jiri ọgwụ.
Na Black Pod dey worry your cocoa. Remove bad pods and spray antifungus.
Your banana plant has Bunchy Top Virus. Remove and destroy infected plants.
Ogede rẹ̀ ní Bunchy Top Virus. Yọ igi tó ní àrùn, pa á.
Ayaba dinka na da Bunchy Top Virus. Cire shukar da cutar ta kama.
Ogede gị nwere Bunchy Top Virus. Kpochapụ igbo ndị nwere ọrịa.
Banana get Bunchy Top Virus. Uproot and burn the infected ones.
